means.word_mean: 1. not having or not capable of producing colors;

sentences.sentence: "the movie was in black and white"

means.word_mean: 2. of a situation that is sharply divided into mutually exclusive categories;

sentences.sentence: "there were no gray areas, you were either for him or against him, he was all black-and-white"
